activity.title: coronasafe/care_fe#5560
activity.text:
i think the appropriate className prop is being sent to the dialog modal in `PatientInfoCard.tsx`, since i am unable to recreate the issue ```javascript <> setOpen(false)} className="w-full max-w-2xl" > ``` ![image](https://github.com/coronasafe/care_fe/assets/54521651/485f0f5c-96ce-4ff6-9aae-339ecc58b7df)
also, when i remove the className prop in `PatientInfoCard.tsx` it recreates the issue ```javascript <> setOpen(false)} className="" > ``` ![image](https://github.com/coronasafe/care_fe/assets/54521651/76b5d5a3-e714-4aee-9294-0d85706a62ee) @nihal467 @rithviknishad
